articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: OpenAI updates ChatGPT to reference your past chats - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI has updated ChatGPT's memory feature to reference your previous conversations in its answers.
articles.content: OpenAI announced on Thursday that it’s starting to roll out a new memory feature in ChatGPT that allows the chatbot to tailor its answers to users based on the contents of their previous conversation… [+1775 chars]
